meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic:
The reading is different from the one you learned with the kanji, so here's a mnemonic for you: 

You're most likely to need a <vocabulary>folding fan</vocabulary> in <reading>Auggie</reading> (おうぎ), AKA August, since that's usually when it's hottest in a lot of places. Just keep in mind that a folding fan = Auggie accessory, and hopefully the おうぎ reading will stick to you (just like the August humidity… unless you have an 扇 on hand.)
